settings.title: IN THE NEWS
settings.subheading: From the New York Times to Vogue, Elle and Allure, Repêchage gets stellar reviews from all the top media.

settings.text: From the New York Times to Vogue, Elle and Allure, Repêchage gets stellar reviews from all the top media.

settings.title: Jezebel
settings.text: Discover Repêchage's seaweed-based skincare, rich in potent nutrients, available at Three13 Salon in Marietta. Embrace the rejuvenating power of the ocean with Repêchage's commitment to top-quality, seaweed-infused products for transformative skincare results.
settings.button_label: Shop Repêchage Skincare

settings.title: NewBeauty
settings.text: "I love how lightweight and gentle it is. My skin feels immediately refreshed" - Brittany Fallon
settings.button_label: Shop C-Serum Seaweed Filtrate Serum

settings.title: health.com
settings.text: After the 4-week testing period, we noticed a boost in overall skin health, more even skin texture, and increased luminosity.
settings.button_label: Shop Honey and Almond Scrub

settings.title: Dermascope
settings.text: Ingredients that both bolster the natural moisturizing factor in skin and help restore essential nutrients and beneficial minerals.
settings.button_label: Shop T-Zone Balance Hydrating Serum

settings.title: Spa & Wellness
settings.text: Teen skincare made easy, as seen in Spa & Wellness Mexicaribe
settings.button_label: Shop T-Zone Balance Starter Collection

settings.title: New Beauty
settings.text: Best described as a “cure in a jar,” Repêchage Vita Cura CelluSea Renewal Dead Sea Bath Salts rely on the brand’s magical ingredient of mineral-rich sea salt for an incredibly relaxing and balancing spa-like experience in your own bath.
settings.button_label: Shop Vita Cura® CelluSea Renewal™ Dead Sea Bath Salts

settings.title: American Spa
settings.text: Lydia Sarfati: Most Influential Spa Leader - 2023 American Spa Professional Choice Awards Winner
settings.button_label: Visit lydiasarfati.com

settings.title: Sass
settings.text: "Dry Brushing is a powerful addition to any skincare and wellness routine. Topical dry brushing has incredible skin exfoliation benefits. The dry bristles exfoliate dry, dead skin cells revealing smoother looking skin." - Shiri Sarfati
settings.button_label: Shop Dry Body Brush with Exfoliating Cactus Bristle

settings.title: New Beauty
settings.text: "So many times, a person will choose based on whether a moisturizer is 'heavy' or 'light,' but it is the ingredients and delivery system that are most important when choosing a moisturizer. This is why it’s essential to consult with a skin-care professional who can accurately identify skin concerns and knows the proper formulations and ingredients to best address the individual." - Lydia Sarfati
settings.button_label: Shop Moisturizers

settings.title: Venice
settings.text: "Run a warm bath and escape from daily stress. These bath salts are rich in minerals like magnesium, calcium and zinc and smell like a healing vacation."
settings.button_label: Featuring Vita Cura® CelluSea Renewal™ Dead Sea Bath Salts

settings.title: NewBeauty
settings.text: "An instant boost of hydration for dry skin, this nutrient-rich moisturizing facial spray contains the brand’s exclusive seaweed extract, as well as vitamin C, ginkgo biloba, aloe and orange water to help keep skin nourished, refreshed and glowing."
settings.button_label: Featuring Algo Mist® Hydrating Seaweed Facial Spray

settings.title: Health
settings.text: "Give your pores a nice, deep clean with our top pick, the Hydra Medic Sea Mud Perfecting Mask"
settings.button_label: Featuring Hydra Medic® Sea Mud Perfecting Mask

settings.title: NewBeauty
settings.text: "This facial features the brand’s signature, nutrient-rich Laminaria digitata seaweed, which is sustainably harvested from the coast of Maine and is a natural source of 12 vitamins including B12, C, E, and K, as well as beta carotene, amino acids and various skin-friendly trace elements"
settings.button_label: Featuring Hydra Dew Pure™ Facial Moisturizer

settings.title: NewBeauty
settings.text: "Reveal radiant skin in 10 minutes with this peptide- and seaweed extract–drenched sheet mask. Thanks to a blend of four different peptides, you can expect a hydrated, firmer-looking complexion with every use."
settings.button_label: Featuring Repêchage® Triple Action Peptide Mask

settings.title: NewBeauty
settings.text: "Head-to-toe skin-fi rming and perfecting treatments to try on your arms, legs and butt at home."
settings.button_label: Featuring Vita Cura® CelluSea Firm™ Neck and Body Serum

settings.title: The Atlantan
settings.text: "I met her, blew her hair out, and we ended up shoe shopping at Neiman Marcus afterward," says Hightower of Lydia Sarfati, founder of renowned luxury skincare brand Repêchage. Sarfati and Hightower have remained close friends ever since that initial shopping trip, leading to Steve Hightower Salon & Spa becoming the first hair salon to carry Repêchage products.

settings.title: NewBeauty
settings.text: "Features seaweed, peptides, caffeine, vitamin C and coenzymes to help improve skin firmness. Use it on the neck and décolleté twice a day for best results."
settings.button_label: Featuring Vita Cura® CelluSea Firm™ Neck and Body Serum

settings.title: Forbes
settings.text: "This collection features five travel-friendly items, from the Hydra Dew Pure™ Gentle Foaming Cleanser to the Hydra Dew Pure™ Eye Contour Cream, to maintain soft and supple skin all day and night."
settings.button_label: Featuring Hydra Dew Pure™ Starter Collection

settings.title: Well Defined
settings.text: "Containing essential minerals like magnesium, calcium, sulfur, bromide, iodine, sodium, zinc, and potassium, Repêchage’s Vita Cura Cellusea Renewal Dead Sea Bath Salts are ideal for pulling toxins from the body and replacing vital minerals and nutrients."
settings.button_label: Featuring Vita Cura® CelluSea Renewal™ Dead Sea Bath Salts

settings.title: American Spa
settings.text: "When used in pharmaceutical formulations for topical use, avocado oil can promote increased collagen synthesis and decreased numbers of inflammatory cells during the wound-healing process and may thus be considered a new option for treating skin wounds. Studies have also found it can be used in the treatment of psoriasis, wrinkles, and stretch marks." —Lydia Sarfati, CEO and founder, Repêchage

settings.title: Forbes
settings.text: "With these refreshing face masks featuring not one, but four peptides, you can firm and plump up slack skin in as little as ten minutes"
settings.button_label: Featuring Repêchage® Triple Action Peptide Mask

settings.title: Simply Buckhead
settings.text: "This new, sugar-based body scrub gently sloughs off dry skin and uses seaweed, cocoa and caffeine extracts to initiate a more toned appearance. Mint essential oils will leave you feeling invigorated. Pro tip: Use it in the morning for a delightful wake-up."
settings.button_label: Featuring Vita Cura® CelluSea Smooth™ Multi-Action Body Exfoliator

settings.title: mindbodygreen
settings.text: "The Repêchage® Ultrasonic Skin Spatula which can aid in exfoliation and relies on ultrasonic waves"
settings.button_label: Featuring Repêchage® Ultrasonic Skin Spatula

settings.title: NewBeauty
settings.text: "Getting the Repêchage Hydra Dew Pure Moisturizing Lift facial featuring the brand’s signature antioxidant-rich seaweed from CEO and founder Lydia Sarfati was a real treat. Laminaria digitata seaweed contains amino acids, vitamins and trace elements and minerals that work to calm and restore aging skin."
settings.button_label: Shop Hydra Dew Pure™ Moisture Lift Serum

settings.title: HuffPost
settings.text: "Toners will help to restore your skin’s pH level, which can be affected by your face wash."
settings.button_label: Shop Repêchage® Toners

settings.title: OK! Magazine
settings.text: "This gift set contains five at-home care products in convenient starter sizes to help mom start their pure skincare journey. It’s also great for on-the-go."
settings.button_label: Featuring Repêchage® Hydra Dew Pure™ Starter Collection

settings.title: Bustle
settings.text: "Sarfati recommends products from Repechage, a brand that produces a multitude of squalane-based formulas. If your skin’s on the sensitive side, try this gentle serum, which also contains moisturizing aloe vera."
settings.button_label: Featuring Repêchage® Hydra 4 Red-Out® Serum

settings.title: NBC News
settings.text: "Our favorite women-owned products in 2021"
settings.button_label: Featuring Hydra Blue® For All Skin Types

settings.title: Identify LA
settings.text: "Our top pick is the Hydra Dew Pure Gentle Foaming Cleanser. It's a softly-foaming, gentle wash that contains three select seaweed extracts to nourish skin, while natural botanicals such as water lily and oat bran extracts help reduce the appearance of irritation."
settings.button_label: Featuring Hydra Dew Pure Gentle Foaming Cleanser

settings.title: 30 Seconds
settings.text: "This long wearing concealer does double duty by counteracting the appearance of redness while helping to conceal the appearance of breakouts."
settings.button_label: Featuring Hydra Medic® Corrective Concealer

settings.title: Spa & Beauty
settings.text: "Envelop the skin in rich moisture and create instantly dewy complexion."
settings.button_label: Featuring Hydra Dew Pure Collection

settings.title: Mane Addicts
settings.text: "Seaweed helps restore a youthful shine to damaged hair while protecting it from styling stress, color fading and frizz."
settings.button_label: Featuring Hydra Medic® Corrective Concealer

settings.title: Society Life Magazine
settings.text: "The formula contains a unique combination of seaweed extract, gingko biloba, and aloe to give skin a healthy glow."
settings.button_label: Featuring Algo Mist® Hydrating Seaweed Facial Spray

settings.title: Stay Fit 305
settings.text: "An Ayurvedic skincare secret, Kansa Wands can be used on the face and body to aid in lymphatic drainage as well as toning. Repechage Kansa Wand is the perfect addition to any treatment and will improve the appearance of skin by toning, tightening and firming skin, while reducing the appearance of puffiness, fine lines, redness and irritation."
settings.button_label: Featuring Kansa Wand

settings.title: Marie Claire
settings.text: "The magic potion... formulated with anti-aging ingredients like niacinamide, hyaluronic acid and laminaria digitata seaweed filtrate."
settings.button_label: Featuring Vita Cura Gold
